title: A yeast–malic acid crosslinker/polyacrylic acid hydrogel containing doxycycline for the treatment of periodontitis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25174-25189
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02638A, Paper
Open Access

Muhammad Qaiser, Muhammad Asmatullah, Dure Shahwar, Muhammad Aqeel, Nabeela Ameer, Khalid Mahmood, Muhammad Hanif, Fazal Rahman Sajid Chughtai, Hafiz Muhammad Usman Abid, Syed Waqas Bukhari
A yeast–malic acid crosslinker/polyacrylic acid hydrogel containing doxycycline for local drug delivery was developed.
